cobblemon.species.poochi.name: Poochi
cobblemon.species.poochi.desc1: With its velvety fur and gentle demeanor, Poochi brings comfort and warmth wherever it goes, spreading joy with its soft cuddles.
cobblemon.species.poochi.desc2: Poochi is commonly found frolicking in the meadows and forests of the Enchanted Grove region, where its soothing presence brings peace to both trainers and wild Pok√©mon alike
